Name: advanced sleep phase syndrome
Definition: A sleep disorder that involves an altered circadian rhythm resulting in falling asleep in early evening and awaking very early in the morning.

Name: sleep apnea
Definition: A sleep disorder characterized by repeated cessation and commencing of breathing that repeatedly disrupts sleep.

Name: delayed sleep phase syndrome
Definition: A sleep disorder characterized by an extreme evening preference

Name: bruxism
Definition: A sleep disorder that involves involuntarily grinding or clenching of the teeth while sleeping.

Name: recurrent hypersomnia
Definition: A sleep disorder that involves recurring bouts of excessive amounts of sleepiness.

Name: narcolepsy
Definition: A sleep disorder that involves an excessive urge to sleep at inappropriate times

Name: REM sleep behavior disorder
Definition: A sleep disorder that involves abnormal behavior including the acting out of violent or dramatic dreams during the sleep phase with rapid eye movement.
Synonym: Rapid eye movement sleep behavior disorder

Name: obsolete Hodgkin's sarcoma involving intrathoracic lymph nodes
Definition: A sleep disorder that involves abnormal behavior including the acting out of violent or dramatic dreams during the sleep phase with rapid eye movement.
Synonym: Hodgkin's sarcoma of intrathoracic lymph nodes (disorder)

Name: obsolete Hodgkin's paragranuloma involving intra-abdominal lymph nodes
Definition: A sleep disorder that involves abnormal behavior including the acting out of violent or dramatic dreams during the sleep phase with rapid eye movement.
Synonym: Hodgkin's paragranuloma of intra-abdominal lymph nodes (disorder)

Name: periodic limb movement disorder
Definition: A sleep disorder that involves involuntary limb movement during sleep.
